name: Be Armenian
description: Embrace your Armenian heritage, and cure any homesickness by downloading this FREE Be Armenian application. From now on, youll have Armenia not only in your heart, but also on your device.   Customize your home screen by choosing from a variety of Armenia-related wallpapers to suit your taste. With several categories to choose from, you can switch around to your hearts content. From photographs of monuments and churches, to images of beautiful relics and ornaments  there is wallpaper out there for everyone. And if you still cant decide on an image, try out our personalized Armenian initial creator, which allows you to write your name in Armenian letters. Simply type in your name, and combine it with beautify designed Armenian initial.  Also, consider making use of our Mesropatar Armenian keyboard, which allows you to type with actual Armenian letters. Not only that, but you can also customize the keyboard to suit the design of your device. Typing in Armenian has never been so fun and easy.  In addition, you may consider sharing the cool features offered by the app with friends and family by sending a specially-designed Armenian eCard. Take your pick according to the occasion, and let your loved one know you are thinking about them on this special day. Sometimes, an occasion isnt even necessary; just remind the person that you care by sending a lovely message.  Express your own thoughts and feelings by sending a personalized eCard to your loved ones. Choose from a variety of different templates that you can easily customize by adding your own images and text. Once your eCard has been personalized, simply let the person know you are thinking of them by sharing it through email or sending it via Facebook.
